item.description:
Join the Mosaic Mountain Club of Massachusetts, and sign up as a member, at their annual picnic and meeting. Learn more about Mosaic and make new friends, as you enjoy a day of picnicking, Frisbee, and hiking, at Houghton’s Pond in the Blue Hills in Milton. We will be supplying food and drink. There will be vegetarian food too. The club will also elect new officers to its board of directors. Don’t miss this day of fun with Mosaic, which has been providing unique outdoor activities for the Jewish community since 1990. The picnic will be held on June 10 from 12:30 p.m. to 6 p.m., at Picnic Site No. 5. You can also start the day with a pre-picnic hike at 10:30 a.m., meeting Koop at picnic site No. 5.

Membership in Mosaic is required in order to participate, so if you plan on attending the picnic you should expect to join ($25 Annually).

For more information about Hougton’s Pond visit: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/metroboston/houghtonsPond.htm.  For a map of Houghton Pond with Picnic Site No. 5 go to: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/metroboston/maps/houghtonsbrochure-map.pdf

Parking entrance is on Blue Hill River Rd.

To learn more about Mosaic visit: www.mosaicofmass.org or http://www.meetup.com/adventurers-88/ to learn more. For information about the picnic email: nrabinowitz@mosaicofmass.org.

Event's Leaders: Nancy R, Program Director & Heather P, President

RSVP: REQUIRED by June 6th to nrabinowitz@mosaicofmass.org
MEET: At Picnic Site No. 5., Houghton's Pond in the Blue Hills, Milton
COST: $12 per person (fee waived when NEW people (not current/former members) join Mosaic the day of the event)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting at Picnic Site No 5

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Mosaic's Annual Picnic and Meeting
